alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns County through 245 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guana River State Park, or 11 miles north of Saint Augustine, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Ponte Vedra, Guana River State Park and South Ponte Vedra Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
